00012 #include <vector>
00013 #include <queue>

00015 #include "stxxl/bits/common/switch.h"
00016 #include "stxxl/bits/io/iobase.h"

00019 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00020

00025 
00026 class set_switch_handler
00027 {
00028     onoff_switch &switch_;
00029 public:
00030     set_switch_handler(onoff_switch & switch__) : switch_(switch__) { }
00031     void operator()  (request * /*req*/) { switch_.on(); }
00032 };
00033 
00038 template <typename block_type, typename bid_iterator_type>
00039 class block_prefetcher
00040 {
00041     block_prefetcher() { }
00042 protected:
00043     bid_iterator_type consume_seq_begin;
00044     bid_iterator_type consume_seq_end;
00045     unsigned_type seq_length;
00046 
00047     int_type * prefetch_seq;
00048 
00049     unsigned_type nextread;
00050     unsigned_type nextconsume;
00051 
00052     const int_type nreadblocks;
00053 
00054     block_type * read_buffers;
00055     request_ptr * read_reqs;
00056 
00057     onoff_switch * completed;
00058     int_type * pref_buffer;
00059 
00060     block_type * wait(int_type iblock)
00061     {
00062         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: waiting block " << iblock);
00063         START_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00064 
00065 #ifdef NO_OVERLAPPING
00066         read_reqs[pref_buffer[iblock]]->poll();
00067 #endif
00068 
00069         completed[iblock].wait_for_on();
00070         END_COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00071         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: finished waiting block " << iblock);
00072         int_type ibuffer = pref_buffer[iblock];
00073         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: returning buffer " << ibuffer);
00074         assert(ibuffer >= 0 && ibuffer < nreadblocks );
00075         return (read_buffers + ibuffer);
00076     }
00077 public:
00084     block_prefetcher(
00085         bid_iterator_type _cons_begin,
00086         bid_iterator_type _cons_end,
00087         int_type * _pref_seq,
00088         int_type _prefetch_buf_size
00089     ) :
00090         consume_seq_begin(_cons_begin),
00091         consume_seq_end(_cons_end),
00092         seq_length(_cons_end - _cons_begin),
00093         prefetch_seq(_pref_seq),
00094         nextread(STXXL_MIN(unsigned_type(_prefetch_buf_size), seq_length)),
00095         nextconsume(0),
00096         nreadblocks(nextread)
00097     {
00098         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: seq_length=" << seq_length);
00099         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: _prefetch_buf_size=" << _prefetch_buf_size);
00100         assert(seq_length > 0);
00101         assert(_prefetch_buf_size > 0);
00102         int_type i;
00103         read_buffers = new block_type[nreadblocks];
00104         read_reqs = new request_ptr[nreadblocks];
00105         pref_buffer = new int_type [seq_length];
00106 
00107         std::fill(pref_buffer, pref_buffer + seq_length, -1);
00108 
00109         completed = new onoff_switch[seq_length];
00110 
00111         for (i = 0; i < nreadblocks; ++i)
00112         {
00113             STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: reading block " << i
00114                                                               << " prefetch_seq[" << i << "]=" << prefetch_seq[i]);
00115             assert( prefetch_seq[i] < int_type(seq_length));
00116             assert( prefetch_seq[i] >= 0 );
00117             read_reqs[i] = read_buffers[i].read (
00118                 *(consume_seq_begin + prefetch_seq[i]),
00119                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + prefetch_seq[i])) );
00120             pref_buffer[prefetch_seq[i]] = i;
00121         }
00122     }
00125     block_type * pull_block()
00126     {
00127         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: pulling a block");
00128         return wait(nextconsume++);
00129     }
00135     bool block_consumed(block_type * & buffer)
00136     {
00137         int_type ibuffer = buffer - read_buffers;
00138         STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: buffer " << ibuffer << " consumed");
00139         if (read_reqs[ibuffer].valid())
00140             read_reqs[ibuffer]->wait();
00141 
00142         read_reqs[ibuffer] = NULL;
00143 
00144         if (nextread < seq_length)
00145         {
00146             assert(ibuffer >= 0 && ibuffer < nreadblocks);
00147             int_type next_2_prefetch = prefetch_seq[nextread++];
00148             STXXL_VERBOSE1("block_prefetcher: prefetching block " << next_2_prefetch);
00149 
00150             assert(next_2_prefetch < int_type(seq_length) && next_2_prefetch >= 0 );
00151             assert( !completed[next_2_prefetch].is_on() );
00152 
00153             pref_buffer[next_2_prefetch] = ibuffer;
00154             read_reqs[ibuffer] = read_buffers[ibuffer].read(
00155                 *(consume_seq_begin + next_2_prefetch),
00156                 set_switch_handler(*(completed + next_2_prefetch))
00157                                  );
00158         }
00159 
00160         if (nextconsume >= seq_length)
00161             return false;
00162 
00163 
00164         buffer = wait(nextconsume++);
00165 
00166         return true;
00167     }
00169     ~block_prefetcher()
00170     {
00171         for (int_type i = 0; i < nreadblocks; ++i)
00172             if (read_reqs[i].valid())
00173                 read_reqs[i]->wait();
00174 
00175 
00176         delete [] read_reqs;
00177         delete [] completed;
00178         delete [] pref_buffer;
00179         delete [] read_buffers;
00180     }
00181 };
00182
